string.text: File

A simple but essential tool used to smooth rough edges, remove rust, or shape metal parts for makeshift repairs in the field.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Weapon Part Maintenance
Multitool

A compact, all-purpose tool equipped with pliers, screwdrivers, blades, and other essentials for weapon and armor disassembly, quick repairs and survival tasks.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Disassembling Tool
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Weapon Part Maintenance
Ramrod

A sturdy cleaning rod used to clear obstructions, swab barrels, and ensure firearms stay functional after heavy use in the Zone’s harsh environment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Weapon Part Maintenance
Universal Weapon Part Cleaning Kit

A versatile cleaning kit designed to maintain a wide range of firearms commonly found in the Zone, from worn Soviet rifles to modern NATO weapons. It includes brushes, solvents, cloths, and tools to remove dirt, carbon buildup, and moisture.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Weapon Part Maintenance
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Weapons
Sewing Thread

A strong, versatile thread essential for stitching up tears in clothing, light armor, or backpacks in the field. Though simple, it’s a crucial part of any survival kit.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Outfit Part Maintenance
Field Armor Toolkit

A compact but comprehensive kit designed for emergency armor repairs in the field, containing basic tools, patches, adhesives, and stitching materials. While it won’t restore gear to factory condition, it can patch bullet holes, reinforce seams, and hold armor together long enough to survive another fight.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Outfit Part Maintenance
Cleaning Solvent "Hoppe's No. 9"

A Western-made, classic and widely respected firearm cleaning solvent, known for its ability to break down carbon, lead, and powder residue. However, it requires adequate tools to be spread properly and should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Increasing Overall Weapon Condition
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Weapons
Spray Lubricant "Brunox Gun Care"

A versatile aerosol lubricant designed to protect firearms from rust, corrosion, and dirt buildup. However, it requires adequate tools to be spread properly and should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Increasing Overall Weapon Condition
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Weapons
Cleaning Solvent "Dvojka"

A Soviet-era gun cleaning solution known for its harsh chemical makeup and strong odor, effective at removing even the toughest grime. However, it requires adequate tools to be spread properly and should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Increasing Overall Weapon Condition
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Weapons
Gun Oil "Rusak"

A plastic bottle containing a budget Russian mineral gun oil intended for lubricating and protecting firearms. However, it requires adequate tools to be spread properly and should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Increasing Overall Weapon Condition
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Weapons
Sewing Kit (Basic)

A light sewing kit consisting of a cloth reel, several steel needles and a pair of scissors. Can be used to sew up bullet holes or ruptures in soft fabrics.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Outfits & Light Headgear Sets
Sewing Kit (Advanced)

An advanced sewing kit containing better sewing accessories than its basic counterpart. Double reels of nylon thread and a large selection of higher-quality needles make it suitable for working on thicker and harder materials, including lighter mutant skins and artificial fibers.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Outfits & Light Headgear Sets
Sewing Kit (Heavy)

This military-grade, heavy sewing kit is designed to handle fractures in protective plates of modern combat armors. It contains enough metallic thread to put together outfits that have literally been torn apart and is capable of sewing on even the hardest of mutant hides.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Outfits & Light Headgear Sets
Glue Tube "M17"

'M17' is the result of a Soviet military-industrial research project intended to devise an extremely potent, single-ingredient adhesive which could be used in any situation regardless of purpose and the materials involved. There is almost no damage that the glue cannot repair.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Outfits & Light Headgear Sets
Glue Tube "Tur"

A modified epoxy-based adhesive produced by the Ukrainian chemical industry to quickly bind most solid materials including both textile fabrics and lighter protective materials like Kevlar. Unfortunately though, it is useless when it comes to binding metals.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Outfits & Light Headgear Sets
Glue Tube "Zviezda"

The cheapest of the synthetic adhesives available in the Zone, this epoxy-based solution may be used to piece together slightly torn pieces of fabric or to patch up small holes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Outfits & Light Headgear Sets
Armor Repair Kit (Light Armor)

This compact kit contains basic tools, adhesive patches, and sealants designed for quick field repairs on lightweight armor and suits. Ideal for stalkers who prioritize speed and mobility, it helps patch minor tears and reinforce protective layers on the go.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] Very Light & Light Armor
Armor Repair Kit (Medium Armor)

This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary, from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches, for conducting complete repairs on any hi-tech armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade Kevlar sheets.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] Medium Armor
Armor Repair Kit (Heavy Armor)

A robust set of tools and materials designed for maintaining and restoring heavy-duty protective suits and thick body armor. It includes reinforced plating segments, industrial-grade adhesives, and specialized tools capable of handling even combat-grade damage.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] Heavy Armor
Armor Repair Kit (Exoskeleton)

A specialized repair package designed for maintaining the delicate balance between the mechanical systems and protective plating of exoskeletons. It includes hydraulic fluid, servo components, joint seals, and heavy plating patches essential for keeping the suit functional.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] Exoskeletons
Repair Kit (Headgear)

This focused kit is designed specifically for repairing helmets, gas masks, and other vital headgear used in the Zone. It contains lens polish, strap replacements, sealant for air filters, and minor plating patches to ensure proper protection against environmental hazards.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] Medium & Heavy Headgear Sets
Armor Repair Kit (Emergency)

A repair set allowing emergency outfit repairs. Includes military grade duct tape and ready-to-use sheets of thick textile in a variety of shapes and sizes making it possible to quickly patch up any outfit damage.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Equipment
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Outfits & Light Headgear Sets
Sharpening Stone Set

A collection of various grit stones packed in a polyester bag. Used to maintain and restore the edges of knives, and other bladed tools, regular sharpening ensures weapons and tools stay effective.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing Knives
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Compatibility: %c[ui_gray_2] All Knives
Repair Kit (Empty)

An empty metal box previously containing tools and spare parts that are useable for maintaining firearms.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Repair Kit (Empty)

An empty metal box previously containing tools and spare parts that are useable for maintaining firearms.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Repair Kit (Empty)

An empty metal box previously containing tools and spare parts that are useable for maintaining firearms.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Repair Kit (Empty)

An empty metal box previously containing tools and spare parts that are useable for maintaining firearms.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
